author: cmpilato
msg: Add a regression test for the bug fixed in r28485.

author: blair
msg: Instead of using %llu for a apr_int64_t, use APR_INT64_T_FMT which

author: epg
msg: Allow the user-agent string sent over http to be defined by the client.
* subversion/libsvn_ra/clientstring.c : new file containing these new
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/ra_serf.h : add an entry for the useragent
(become_request) : use the useragent string stored in the connection.
(svn_ra_serf__conn_setup) : create the useragent string and store it
(svn_ra_serf__setup_serf_req) : use the useragent string of the
(test_namestring): Test these new functions at least somewhat; when
we can run these tests over non-local RA layers, I guess we could
parse the request log to verify it's actually being sent...
Slight tweaks and Python tests by me

author: epg
msg: Non-zero exit codes from start- and pre- hooks indicate the action is
blocked by the administrator, not that the hook *failed*.  Make the
error message more accurate in such cases.
(check_hook_result): Continue reporting failure for the pre-/start-
hooks if they fail to execute, but if they just exited non-zero,
(hook_failure_message): Adapt to new hook failure messages.
